title: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work-Versatile Foot Stool with Washable Cover-Comfortable Footrest with 2 Adjustable Heights for Car,Home and Office to Relieve Back,Lumbar,Knee Pain-Black
descriptions:
Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work! This versatile foot stool is the perfect addition to your workspace, providing ultimate comfort and relief from back, lumbar, and knee pain. 

Made with high-quality foam and a durable fabric cover, this footrest is built to last. The sleek black color adds a touch of sophistication to any setting. 

With adjustable heights, you can customize the footrest to your preferred level of comfort. The magic tapes and zipper mechanism make it easy to adjust the height according to your needs. 

Cleaning is a breeze with the removable cover. Simply unzip and throw it in the washing machine for a quick and convenient clean. 

The non-slip design ensures that the footrest stays securely in place, giving you peace of mind while you work. 

Not only is this footrest suitable for office use, but it is also perfect for your car, home, and even on airplanes. It can be used under your feet or behind your knees for maximum support and relief. 

Invest in your well-being and sit with correct posture with the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to a more comfortable work experience. Don't miss out on this essential accessory for a healthier and happier you!

Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work - the ultimate solution for all your foot comfort needs! This versatile foot stool is designed to provide unparalleled comfort and support, allowing you to relieve back, lumbar, and knee pain while maintaining correct sitting posture. 

Crafted with high-quality foam and a durable fabric cover, this footrest ensures long-lasting durability and a soft, plush feel. The sleek black color adds a touch of sophistication to any workspace or home decor. 

Measuring at 16.9 inches in length, 11.2 inches in width, and 2.0 inches in height, the lower layer of this footrest perfectly accommodates your feet, while the upper layer with a thickness of 3.7 inches provides extra cushioning for added comfort. But that's not all - the footrest features 2 adjustable heights, allowing you to customize your sitting experience to your preference. The magic tapes and zipper mechanism make adjusting the height a breeze. 

Cleaning is a breeze with the BlissTrends Foot Rest. The cover can be easily removed through the zipper closure and is machine washable, ensuring a clean and fresh footrest at all times. 

Designed with a non-slip bottom, this footrest stays securely in place, providing stability and preventing any accidental slips or movements. 

Not just limited to the office, this footrest is suitable for use in cars, homes, and even airplanes! Whether you place it under your feet or behind your knees, the BlissTrends Foot Rest guarantees maximum comfort and relief. 

Invest in your well-being with the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work. Experience the ultimate in foot comfort and say goodbye to discomfort and poor posture. Order now and provide your feet with the care they deserve!
